MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Bangorshill street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.39am.  Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault finding and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.27am on 18th January 2021.
